hl.seg: The lack of snow concern the hotel

p.seg: The trails deserted problem to operators of lifts.
The lack of snow book their stays in hotels and pensions.
Of this, it is still possible for all dates in winter, including Christmas and new year.
We have a lot of visits site.
The Internet travel offers prices but dare not commit to reserve for the moment.
And if they call, they ask there will be snow or mud at Christmas, "said Martin Jandura, operator of Spindl.info. information portal
If we want to spend New Year of his dreams to Špindlerův Mlýn, better is no longer hesitate to book.
If the priority is given to economies and that the quality of accommodation only then, we can try to wait a few more days.
The Špindler hotel offer for the moment that stays of one week for the new year.
I think that they will try again a moment of the place, but they Cèderont them and accept shorter periods.
And then the number of rooms free will quickly, "said Jandura.
The tourism Ingtours Agency of free beds for all periods of winter.
The week of Christmas we are most concerned for the moment, it is not completely sold.
There are still free, say, half our offer.
That is why we have already prepared a few last minute Christmas stays cheaper, "said the director of Ingtours Petr Schiefert.
The tourism agency of Vrchlabí new year to Krkonoše, but there are fewer places free.
The first fourteen days of February go well, the remaining winter trips sell moderately.
This year, interest for been negatively influenced by the fact that there is still no snow to Krkonoše.
The people expect that it will start to fall.
Nobody wants to spend the winter untain without snow.
If the trails cover during the week, Christmas also will be complete, "think Schiefert.
In contrast, the occupation of the hotel Horizont CI pod Sněžkou is slightly higher than last year.
It was an improvement of almost five percent.
We still last few places for the new year as for Christmas.
There is a great interest during the holidays of January of selling well, "inform Karel Rada, Director of best hotel CI.
The Omnia Hotel near the parking central Jánské Lázně is also full to eighty percent during the new year period.
On the contrary, half the beds remain empty at Christmas in Lázně.
This year, we have been pleasantly , where we already have sixty percent of occupation at the moment.
February is a little more low at the moment, but as soon as snow will fall, the interest for the Krkonoše still enlarging certainly indicated the Director of the hotel Omnia, Erik Sporysch.
The hotel Krkonoše must not however hope more snow.
Thursday it will more costs and if there are precipitation, they should be snowy mountain.
But by the time should be warm, inform Jiří Jakubský of Hradec station of the Czech Hydrometeorological Institute.

hl.seg: United States: repetition is mother of wisdom

p.seg: It becomes even comic, conscientious effort with which Barack Obama, President to the reputation of wise, reproduces the strategy of his predecessor on the Afghan question, he considered himself very simple.
When he eventually leave sweat its doctrine so eagerly awaited, it emerged that he had Recopied carbon paper since the Iraq scenario of Bush three years ago.

Not content to use in the text several times the expression "as in Iraq", he has not hesitated, that is, to use the title of the January 2007 speech by Bush as the title of his own speech: "a new road before"
At the same time, he has personally criticised the idea of Bush to send new reinforcements in Iraq consumed by the civil war as "irresponsible and a disastrous decision in its consequences."

The following months have however shown that Bush ’ s strategy, which stemmed from recommendations of the campaigns commanders, was the only possible and likely success to the point that the newspapers at the moment do not speak at all of Iraq.
This has not improved the Bush reputation, objectively speaking, it has left to his successor a final situation much more favourable than we might hope.
Barack Obama hope that in Afghanistan, the miracle will happen

They are again the commanders of campaigns that have requested an increase of military contingent, including the Afghan operation commander, General Stanley Mccristal, who has severely criticised the reluctance of the White House despite the habits of subordination.
He asked 40 000 men in order to make the situation more favourable.
The President has hesitated for three months but in the absence of a better alternative, at least it has defrauded the general 10 000 soldiers.
He has managed to extricate the promise of additional 5 000 from the Europe, even if there were over 10 000.

This causes the most problems throughout the strategy of Obama seems to be its intention to withdraw military forces from Afghanistan within 18 months and to complete this whole process by three years. The doctrine of Obama brings more questions than it answers.
Many doubt the fact that an increase of half will bring the same fruit that progress in Iraq.
In spite of fratricidal wars in recent years, the Iraqi society is relatively well organised and its leaders honour the agreements.
The Afghan situation stands by the exact opposite - we cannot rely on person and no treaty is respected.
In these conditions, difficult to prepare Afghan security forces, used to change leader from day to day depending on what suits them.
The political institutions, although based formally remain that the smokescreen behind which will proliferate patriarchal ethnic relations.
It is particularly complex balancing the interests of various ethnic groups given the lack of clarity about the reports, which are still complicated by the Pakistani and Iranian influences.
Even the foundation of a "state quick to act ', which is the aim of the operation, does not seem to be very real.
The time horizon of the Obama strategy makes perplexed by his proactive.
In the past eight years, the situation in Afghanistan has deteriorated and is currently on the brink of chaos.
Only a heart purely romantic and out of reality can be persuaded that the small soldiers sent in the clamour of war in view of their "quick return to the home" will bring a real miracle.
From a political point of view, fix a date for the withdrawal of troops is purely irresponsible because the Taliban will see us as the indirect admission of defeat.
The last NATO summit showed that in military operations in Afghanistan is moving towards the negative.
The European political or do not want to explain to their electorate in what the security in Germany or Italy is linked to a war in the mountains of the Hindu Kush.
Another factor capable of radically alter of events related to Iran.

If the situation continues to deteriorate and the reinforced sanctions do not have effects on the Iranians, the Americans find themselves faced with the very difficult issue of a resolution of the problem by the use of military force.
It must be addressed by example when, according to Obama, America will the victorious withdrawal of troops in Afghanistan.
Each solution of this kind will however a dramatic reversal of the Afghan situation.
The only patch for Obama is the fact that it remains three years until the presidential elections and therefore there is still enough time to working on a new strategy, if it proves to be a flop.

hl.seg: The leaders of the bank Goldman Sachs will receive more than premiums in cash

p.seg: The top leaders of the American bank Goldman Sachs employees will receive this year of cash premiums.
The company announced to respond to strong criticism about its practices.
The group of 30 leaders will receive shares instead of money, that they will not sell before five years.
The actions can be withdrawn to leaders in cases where they would take too many risks.
According to Reuters, Goldman Sachs arises the rewards with long-term performance to Wall Street.
I assume that Wall Street is well aware need to take, "said the former investment banker Douglas Elliott of JPMorgan
The concern is in the details, he added.
The bank Goldman Sachs has after set aside almost $17 billion to premiums on the first three quarters of this year.
For the current year, the total amount of premiums is likely to exceed $20 billion in despite the announcement today, according to the Reuters news agency.
With the arrival of the financial crisis, have become a sensitive political issue in many countries.
The Kingdom announced Wednesday that it intends to affect a single fee of 50% bankers' bonuses exceeding 25,000 books.
The France preparing similar measures.

hl.seg: This year the women received the Nobel Prize in all areas except the physical

p.seg: These are five women, a record Stockholm at the hands of the King of Sweden Charles XVI Gustave Nobel Prize in technical disciplines and literature.
Besides the four scientists there was also the German writer of Romanian origin Herta Müller.
Two American biologists, Elizabeth Blackburn and Carol Greider received with their fellow Jack Szostak the Nobel Prize for medicine for their research in the area of chromosomes.
The prize for chemistry was awarded to the Israeli Ada Jonath with the Americans Venkatraman Ramakrishnan and Thomas Steitz have clarified the structure and function of ribosomes
The last winner was awarded the Nobel Prize in economics, US Elinor Ostrom with his countryman Oliver Williamson, for their analysis of economic governance.
The only technical discipline that had no winner this year was the physical.

This award was presented today scientists Charles Kao for his research in the area of Fibreoptics and George Smith Avecwillard Boyle for their invention of CCD chips, which are currently at the basis of all the digital cameras, fax or refracting telescopes.
Each winner received the diploma, the Nobel medal and certificate of acquisition of financial reward.
It reached 10 million Swedish crowns in each category. (approximately EUR 1.1 million)
If one of them contains several winners, they share the award among them.
The much-anticipated Nobel peace prize has already been postponed this afternoon in Oslo, Norway, in US President Barack Obama.

This, in his speech, recognized the controversial nature of its award as it is only at the beginning of their journey and that it is also at the head of a country engaged in two wars, in Iraq and Afghanistan.
In the discharge of its policy he added that in some situations the war is essential to achieve peace, even if the price is high.

hl.seg: The Minister Janota intends to resign. Klaus has invited to Château

p.seg: The President Václav Klaus will Friday morning the Finance Minister Eduard Janota, which weighs his stay in government because of his disagreement with the state budget for the next year as it was adopted by the Chamber of Deputies
It is estimated that the budget and perhaps also the position of Janota to Cabinet will be on the agenda of their appointment on Friday.
Klaus also criticised the budget.
According to him, the deficit is too important, widening the public finance crisis.
It is the presidential spokesman Radim Ochvat has informed of the meeting.
Janota then discuss its service Monday with Prime Minister Jan Fischer.
According to the legislation on the budget which will be subject to the signing of Klaus, it is a deficit of crowns 163 billion that the Czech Republic should manage.
Nevertheless, the Chamber proposals of the left about transfers of money and has increased the rewards of officials, the operation of social services and direct payments to farmers.
The government accused proposals of the Social Democrats that they would increase the budget deficit in an indirect way.

For this reason, a violent disagreement arose between left on the one hand, the government, Klaus and right on the other hand, disagreement which calls into question the future of Fischer who had been formed by agreement between the ODS, the Čssd and the Green Party.
The critics claim that the budget, as it has been voted package of savings measures by the Government from Fischer and who must according to stem the indebtedness of the state.

Klaus, who may ratify the Law on the State budget but that there is no requirement, said today at a breakfast discussion with entrepreneurs, that policies have long neglected the "serious problem" of the "disability Irréfrénable" of public finances.
At present there is, according to him, no positive solution.
Only a strong government could bring an improvement, if it could rely on a broad consensus among the political parties, according to the president.
The President of the ODS Mirek Topolánek has and that the government should question its existence.
The Vice-President of the ODS Petr Nečas told the Čtk that the idea of a Cabinet administrative supported by the Čssd, ODS and Greens works clearly more.
In its response, the Prime Minister Fischer described such words of 'verdicts drastic ".
The head of Čssd Jiří Paroubek reacted to deficit for this year by the former government of Topolánek is staggering and that it will exceed 200 billion kronor.
Wednesday, Čssd described success already the ratification of the state budget for the next year.
The Popular Party was also pleased.
